dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9694 IH: For the relief of Jan van Hoek.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. C. Scott Franklin of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: For the relief of Jan van Hoek.

section.header: Exemption of Jan van Hoek from National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program petition deadlines
section.text: The deadlines described in section 2116 of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300aaâ€“16) with respect to petitions filed for compensation under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program shall not apply to a petition filed with respect to a vaccine-related injury occurring as a result of the administration to Jan van Hoek of a vaccine during the period that began on March 6, 2007, and ended on December 31, 2010.
